results.title: American Could Face Prison in Thailand After Posting Negative Reviews of a Resort
results.abstract: The man was arrested under Thailand’s criminal defamation law, which has been used to silence critics and stifle dissent. The hotel that brought charges acknowledges that using the law might be “excessive.”
